analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/42/0xbdc54221916a7d441bccc04b5d5c29b0912b0b73.sol:

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/42/0xbdc54221916a7d441bccc04b5d5c29b0912b0b73.sol#78) is not in mixedCase
